header_text: Your anniversary with your significant other is this weekend, but they haven't mentioned they made any big plans. Having your expectations let down seems to happen often, and you think it's time to bring it up to them. You figure out a way to bring it up calmly.

elements.Text: Do you expect your conversation with your significant other to end in a fight?
